name: sypher-tools
description: Database of helpful tools for crypto frontends.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build.css && rollup -c
scripts.build.css: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path dist\css\themes; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path dist\css; Copy-Item -Path src\css\themes\*.css -Destination dist\css\themes\ -Recurse; Copy-Item -Path src\css\*.css -Destination dist\css\ -Recurse" && npx postcss dist\css\**\*.css --use autoprefixer --dir dist\css --no-map
